header.description: This plugin allows for uninstalling/installing packages through IBM Installation Manager.

step-type.name: Execute Response File
step-type.description: Execute a `imcl` response file using IBM Installation Manager. This step can be used to install all products that use the IBM Installation Manager for installation.

property-ui.label: Response File Variables

property-ui.description: A Secure Storage File contains passwords for Respositories that require authentication
property-ui.label: Secure Storage File

property-ui.description: The master password file is a text file that contains a passphrase to secure the Storage File. This file should have OS permissions set appropriately.
property-ui.label: Master Password File
